name: Good Ol' Twitter's Fav Star
description:
Do you miss the good old fav star on Twitter? Here you a CSS style to replace the "Hearts"! Features:
  • Amazing 30 fps animation.
  • Full convertion: all hearts from notifications page, login page and timeline will be replaced.
  • URI coded image to improve performance.
additional_info:
Versions:
  • v 1.0 First release: I hope you'll enjoy it!
  • v 1.1 Update: for reasons Twitter changed some css references and that makes this style work properly no more. Now fixed.
  • v 1.2 #NewTwitter Update: New Design.
  • v 1.3 fixed some bug caused by the #NewTwitter update.
  • v 1.4 fixed Media Fav button.
Created by Sighij Contact me on Twitter: @LordSighij
